#### Function for calculating moving average
```{r Function}
movavg <- function(x, interval = 7) {
  j <- interval
  moving_avg <- vector(mode = 'double', length = length(x))
  for(i in 1:length(x)) {
    moving_avg[j] <- mean(x[i:interval])
    if (interval >= length(x)) {
      return(moving_avg)
    } else {
      interval <- interval + 1
    }
    j <- j + 1
  }
}
```
